lead_paragraph: WEILAND--Suzanne (Adelman), 92, in Cambridge, MA, formerly of NYC. Loving mother to Nancy (Weiland) and Tom Carpenter, and grandmother to Jonathan K. Stavely. Predeceased by Edwin I. Weiland, her cherished husband of 65 years, daughter Patricia Stavely, sister Adrienne Doniger, and brother Peter Adelman. Loved by her nieces, nephews and the many friends she made over her years. She will be missed. Contributions in her memory may be made to Smith College, Southern Poverty Law Center, and Doctors Without Borders. 1/3
